title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
summary: A philosophical story about a shepherd's journey to fulfill his personal legend.

title: Clean Code
author: Robert C. Martin
summary: A handbook of best practices for writing clean and maintainable code.

title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
author: Yuval Noah Harari
summary: A fascinating exploration of the history and impact of humankind on Earth.

title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
summary: A guide to building good habits, breaking bad ones, and mastering small behaviors for big results.

title: The Pragmatic Programmer
author: Andrew Hunt & David Thomas
summary: A must-read for software developers covering techniques to become a better programmer.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
summary: A novel that explores serious issues like racial injustice and moral growth through the eyes of a child.

title: The Art of War
author: Sun Tzu
summary: An ancient Chinese military treatise offering timeless wisdom on strategy and warfare.

title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
author: Mark Manson
summary: A counterintuitive approach to living a good life by focusing on what truly matters.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
author: J.K. Rowling
summary: The first book in the Harry Potter series, following a young wizard's discovery of his magical heritage.

title: Dune
author: Frank Herbert
summary: A science fiction masterpiece set in a distant future where politics, religion, and ecology collide.

title: The 48 Laws of Power
author: Robert Greene
summary: A controversial guide on gaining and maintaining power in different areas of life.

author: George Orwell
summary: A chilling vision of a totalitarian future where the government controls every aspect of life.

title: Rich Dad Poor Dad
author: Robert Kiyosaki
summary: A financial education book that contrasts the mindsets of the rich and the poor.

title: The Lean Startup
author: Eric Ries
summary: A methodology for startup success by focusing on rapid experimentation and customer feedback.
